Methods

GetYieldCurveQuotesAsync(GovernmentBondNominalRating, QuoteType, Maturity)

Asynchronously retrieves yield curve quotes for the specified government bond nominal rating, quote type and maturity across all available dates.

public Task<IEnumerable<YieldCurveQuote>> GetYieldCurveQuotesAsync(GovernmentBondNominalRating governmentBondNominalRating, QuoteType yieldCurveQuoteType, Maturity maturity)

Parameters

governmentBondNominalRating GovernmentBondNominalRating

The nominal rating of the government bonds to load quotes for.

yieldCurveQuoteType QuoteType
maturity Maturity

The maturity for which to retrieve quotes.

Returns

Task<IEnumerable<YieldCurveQuote>>

A task that resolves to a collection of YieldCurveQuote instances for the requested maturity across available dates.

GetYieldCurveQuotesAsync(GovernmentBondNominalRating, QuoteType, Maturity, DateTime, DateTime)

Asynchronously retrieves yield curve quotes for the specified government bond nominal rating, quote type and maturity within the inclusive date range defined by startDate and endDate.

public Task<IEnumerable<YieldCurveQuote>> GetYieldCurveQuotesAsync(GovernmentBondNominalRating governmentBondNominalRating, QuoteType quoteType, Maturity maturity, DateTime startDate, DateTime endDate)

Parameters

governmentBondNominalRating GovernmentBondNominalRating

The nominal rating of the government bonds to load quotes for.

quoteType QuoteType

The type of quote to retrieve.

maturity Maturity

The maturity for which to retrieve quotes.

startDate DateTime

Inclusive start date of the range to retrieve quotes for.

endDate DateTime

Inclusive end date of the range to retrieve quotes for.

Returns

Task<IEnumerable<YieldCurveQuote>>

A task that resolves to a collection of YieldCurveQuote instances within the requested date range.
